availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Organized at Indianapolis, Indiana, and Richmond Indiana. Mustered in on November 18, 1861, and mustered out December 14, 1865. Commander(s): John W. T. McMullen, Cyrus C. Hines, George W. Lennard, Willis Blanch, and John S. McGraw.

ab.bibl:
Frederick H. Dyer, A Compendium of the War of the Rebellion (Des Moines, IA: The Dyer Publishing Company, 1908), 137, 1140-41.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Indiana, vol. 2, 1861-1865 (Indianapolis: W. R. Holloway, State Printer, 1865), 548.
Asbury L. Kerwood, Annals of the Fifty-Seventh Regiment Indiana Volunteers: Marches, Battles, And Incidents of Army Life (Dayton: O. W. J. Shuey, 1868), 325.
